phew! they figured out a weird plan b
it's a very curious thing: creating a new stack over, naming a different path and dropbox folder and then publishing all of it over worked
something in the publishing process trips it up, and then you can't publish anymore
so you have to start over by copying all of your work

there's a try catch block inside a promise function
because of the new statefulbutton refactor that requires a promise function

message.div: but if you want to be clean move the catch block into a catch method!

div.span: You should never use try catch block inside promise code - with promises all errors either synchronous or asynchronous end up in the same `.catch()` callbacks.
